title: An issue
body: Well, today I went online and my friend bought 3 of these random skin things that I did not want while I was going to the toilet. I just want to know if I could please get a refund because I wasn't the one who bought these items and I was also saving up my rp for the upcoming June sale where a few skins and champs that I want would be placed on sale. Thanks.

replies.body: Ye I think that's fair, he should get it refunded
